title: Rishi Sunak – 2020 Statement on the Coronavirus
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the statement made by Rishi Sunak, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 14 April 2020.
content:
Good evening from Downing Street, where I’m joined by Steve Powis, Medical Director of the NHS and Yvonne Doyle, Medical Director at Public Health England.

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
